mapper.select: SELECT no,title,email,regdate,hit,group_tab,num FROM (SELECT no,title,email,regdate,hit,group_tab,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,title,email,regdate,hit,group_tab FROM qna ORDER BY group_id DESC, group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(no,email,title,content,hit,group_id) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1,1) FROM qna), #{email},#{title},#{content},0, (SELECT NVL(MAX(GROUP_id)+1,1) FROM qna) )
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, email, regdate, hit FROM qna
